15#include <config.h>
16
17#include <errno.h>
18#include <unistd.h>
19
20#include <isc/stdio.h>
21#include <isc/stat.h>
22#include <isc/util.h>
23
24#include "errno2result.h"
25
26isc_result_t
27isc_stdio_open(const char *filename, const char *mode, FILE **fp) {
28 FILE *f;
29
30 f = fopen(filename, mode);
31 if (f == NULL)
32 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
33 *fp = f;
34 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
35}
36
37isc_result_t
38isc_stdio_close(FILE *f) {
39 int r;
40
41 r = fclose(f);
42 if (r == 0)
43 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
44 else
45 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
46}
47
48isc_result_t
49isc_stdio_seek(FILE *f, off_t offset, int whence) {
50 int r;
51
52 r = fseeko(f, offset, whence);
53 if (r == 0)
54 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
55 else
56 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
57}
58
59isc_result_t
60isc_stdio_tell(FILE *f, off_t *offsetp) {
61 off_t r;
62
63 REQUIRE(offsetp != NULL);
64
65 r = ftello(f);
66 if (r >= 0) {
67 *offsetp = r;
68 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
69 } else
70 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
71}
72
73isc_result_t
74isc_stdio_read(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *f, size_t *nret) {
75 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
76 size_t r;
77
78 clearerr(f);
79 r = fread(ptr, size, nmemb, f);
80 if (r != nmemb) {
81 if (feof(f))
82 result = ISC_R_EOF;
83 else
84 result = isc__errno2result(errno);
85 }
86 if (nret != NULL)
87 *nret = r;
88 return (result);
89}
90
91isc_result_t
92isc_stdio_write(const void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE *f,
93 size_t *nret)
94{
95 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
96 size_t r;
97
98 clearerr(f);
99 r = fwrite(ptr, size, nmemb, f);
100 if (r != nmemb)
101 result = isc__errno2result(errno);
102 if (nret != NULL)
103 *nret = r;
104 return (result);
105}
106
107isc_result_t
108isc_stdio_flush(FILE *f) {
109 int r;
110
111 r = fflush(f);
112 if (r == 0)
113 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
114 else
115 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
116}
117
118/*
119 * OpenBSD has deprecated ENOTSUP in favor of EOPNOTSUPP.
120 */
121#if defined(EOPNOTSUPP) && !defined(ENOTSUP)
122#define ENOTSUP EOPNOTSUPP
123#endif
124
125isc_result_t
126isc_stdio_sync(FILE *f) {
127 struct stat buf;
128 int r;
129
130 if (fstat(fileno(f), &buf) != 0)
131 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
132
133 /*
134 * Only call fsync() on regular files.
135 */
136 if ((buf.st_mode & S_IFMT) != S_IFREG)
137 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
138
139 r = fsync(fileno(f));
140 if (r == 0)
141 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
142 else
143 return (isc__errno2result(errno));
144}
